about.content: At Gleaftex, we combine traditional Thai wisdom with modern eco-friendly technology to create textiles that honor nature and culture. Our fabrics are designed for the tropical Southeast Asian climate and meet global sustainability standards.

organicCotton.name: Organic Cotton
organicCotton.subtitle: Sustainable and Skin-Friendly
organicCotton.description: GREENLEAF upholds the concept of green environmental protection, carefully cultivating organic cotton in the unique ecological fields of northern Thailand. All raw materials reject chemical pesticides and fertilizers, relying solely on natural sunlight, rain, and organic compost to nourish the cotton, ensuring each fiber retains the pure and gentle essence of nature. Through refined processing, the organic cotton fibers exhibit excellent qualities of natural softness, breathability, and skin-friendliness, with good moisture absorption and wrinkle resistance, making garments more comfortable and durable. The entire production process strictly implements energy conservation and green closed-loop management, with each product passing international environmental certification tests, bringing consumers a healthy and fashionable wearing experience. Wearing GREENLEAF organic cotton products not only allows one to experience the beauty of nature but also actively participates in global ecological protection, jointly promoting sustainable development and building a pure and harmonious future.
features: Free from harmful chemicals and pesticides
Uses 71% less water than conventional cotton
Reduces soil erosion and improves biodiversity
Exceptionally soft, ideal for sensitive skin

recycledPolyester.name: Recycled Polyester
recycledPolyester.subtitle: From Plastic Bottles to Premium Fabrics
recycledPolyester.description: GREENLEAF leverages cutting-edge environmental technology to efficiently transform waste plastic into high-quality recycled polyester fibers, injecting new green vitality into the textile industry. Selected raw materials undergo strict purification, modification, and fine processing, ensuring the recycled polyester fibers maintain excellent wear resistance and elasticity while presenting vibrant, long-lasting colors that meet modern clothing's dual requirements for fashion and functionality. In the production process, we focus on reducing energy consumption and carbon emissions, achieving waste recycling and reuse, effectively reducing environmental pollution, and practicing sustainable development principles. All products have obtained international environmental certifications, ensuring no harmful residues and providing safe, healthy wearing experiences. Wearing GREENLEAF recycled polyester products represents a firm commitment to an eco-friendly lifestyle, jointly opening a new chapter in a low-carbon, green future.
features: Reduces plastic waste and petroleum consumption
Can be blended with natural fibers to enhance performance

bambooFabric.name: Bamboo Fabric
bambooFabric.subtitle: Natural Comfort for Tropical Climate
bambooFabric.description: GREENLEAF draws upon the abundant natural resources and green wisdom of northern Thailand, carefully selecting bamboo from natural bamboo forests and transforming it into high-quality bamboo fiber fabric through advanced technology. The fabric fully retains bamboo's natural antibacterial, breathable, temperature-regulating, and silky properties while significantly reducing water consumption and chemical additives through eco-friendly processing, truly achieving green manufacturing. The product features fine texture and natural luster, with excellent moisture-wicking properties, providing wearers with healthy and comfortable experiences. The entire process strictly follows international environmental standards, with every step carefully monitored to ensure product safety and harmlessness. Wearing GREENLEAF bamboo fiber clothing allows one to experience the beauty of natural freshness while showcasing fashion taste and environmental consciousness, jointly moving towards a low-carbon, sustainable future.
features: Absorbs 3-4 times more moisture than cotton
